verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w who|strong="H4397"\w* \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w came|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* woke \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w as|strong="H1696"\w* someone \w who|strong="H4397"\w* \w is|strong="H1696"\w* woken \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3605"\w* said \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*?” \w I|strong="H2009"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bowl|strong="H1543"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*. \w There|strong="H2009"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w pipes|strong="H4166"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w*, \w which|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w*,

\w and|strong="H8147"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w trees|strong="H2132"\w* \w next|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w one|strong="H8147"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w side|strong="H3225"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bowl|strong="H1543"\w*, \w and|strong="H8147"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w other|strong="H8147"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w* \w side|strong="H3225"\w*.”

\w I|strong="H4100"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w who|strong="H4397"\w* \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w*, \w my|strong="H1696"\w* lord?”

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w who|strong="H1992"\w* \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*, “Don’t \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w*?” \w And|strong="H6030"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*. “\w No|strong="H3808"\w*, \w my|strong="H3045"\w* lord.”

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w regarding|strong="H2088"\w* \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w*: \w Not|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w might|strong="H3581"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, \w says|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*,

\w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w I|strong="H6440"\w* make \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w plain|strong="H4334"\w*. \w He|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w top|strong="H7222"\w* stones \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w shoutings|strong="H8663"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w*, ‘\w Grace|strong="H2580"\w*, \w grace|strong="H2580"\w*, \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w*.’”

\w Moreover|strong="H1961"\w* \w this|strong="H1697"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*:

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w laid|strong="H3245"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w finish|strong="H1214"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*. \w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* despised \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w small|strong="H6996"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*? \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* plumb line \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w*. (\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* lamps \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w search|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w around|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* world.)

\w Again|strong="H6030"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w these|strong="H8147"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w trees|strong="H2132"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w side|strong="H3225"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w* \w side|strong="H3225"\w*?”

\w Again|strong="H8145"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w these|strong="H8147"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w branches|strong="H7641"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w trees|strong="H2132"\w*, \w which|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* pouring \w out|strong="H7324"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w oil|strong="H7324"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w pipes|strong="H6804"\w*?”

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* answered \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, “Don’t \w you|strong="H3045"\w* now \w what|strong="H4100"\w* these \w are|strong="H4100"\w*?” \w And|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* said, “\w No|strong="H3808"\w*, \w my|strong="H3045"\w* lord.”

\w Then|strong="H5975"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* explained, “\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w anointed|strong="H3323"\w* \w ones|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w attend|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth.”
